title: The Ultimate Kink
description: Security experts Canin and Kasey must pose as a married couple in a sex club in order to catch a rapist. Together, they enter a world of bondage and voyeurism that will test their friendship ... and buried attraction. Publisher's Note: This book contains explicit sexual content, graphic language, and situations that some readers may find objectionable: Anal play/intercourse, BDSM theme and content, exhibitionism, flashback to graphic rape, violence, voyeurism.
author: Cameron Dane
